channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Charlie Kirk shooting: FBI shares person of interest photos, offers $100,000 reward
item.description: Kirk, a close ally of President Donald Trump, was killed by a gunman during a political event at Utah Valley University in Orem.

item.title: Stocks and bonds are sending very different messages about recession risks
Brazil's Bolsonaro guilty of coup charges, court majority decides in landmark trial
item.description: Former Brazilian president Jair Bolsonaro was convicted by a Supreme Court majority of plotting a coup to remain in power after losing the 2022 electi...

item.title: Trump asks appeals court to let him fire Lisa Cook before next week's Fed meeting
item.description: Trump wants the Fed to slash rates in order to spur economic growth and reduce the cost of paying the nation's debts.

item.title: Dow closes over 46K for first time, joins S&P and Nasdaq in booking new records
‘The country will heal’ after Charlie Kirk’s assassination, Trump tells CNBC
item.description: President Donald Trump told CNBC's Joe Kernen that he believes "the country will heal" in the wake of conservative activist Charlie Kirk's assassinati...

item.title: U.S. will split profits with Tokyo from Japan-funded projects until $550 billion is recouped: Lutnick
item.description: Lutnick said the U.S. will initially split profits equally on projects funded through Japan's $550 billion investment.

item.title: Figure's IPO sizzles as investors stay hungry for crypto deals
Adobe’s stock has fallen after its last four earnings. Can AI finally deliver?
Adobe’s stock rises as earnings beat shows that AI is finally paying off
